Parameters:

unsigned int vfpu_rand_8888 ( int  min,
int  max 
)

Return random color value in 8888 format This always sets the alpha channel value to 0xFF

Parameters:
min - minimum value for each color channel (0..255)
max - maximum value for each color channel (0..255)

float  far 
)

Generate a perspective projection matrix

aspect - aspect ratio of viewport

far - far clipping plane

float  ze,
float  rad,
float *  x,
float *  y,
float *  z 
)

Convert input sphere coordinates to cartesian coordinates

Parameters:
az - azimuth angle (0 to PI*2)
ze - zenith angle (0 to PI)
rad - sphere radius
x - pointer to float for x coordinate
y - pointer to float for y coordinate
z - pointer to float for z coordinate

void vfpu_quaternion_identity ( ScePspQuatMatrix *  q  ) 

Generate an identity quaternion

Parameters:
q - pointer to quaternion
this will set the quaternion's components to 0,0,0,1

void vfpu_quaternion_sample_linear ( ScePspQuatMatrix *  qout,
ScePspQuatMatrix *  a,
ScePspQuatMatrix *  b,
float  t 
)

Return a sample from a linear interpolation of 2 quaternions

Parameters:
qout - pointer to output quaternion
a - pointer to starting quaternion
b - pointer to ending quaternion
t - time value to sample, from 0 to 1

void vfpu_quaternion_sample_hermite ( ScePspQuatMatrix *  qout,
ScePspQuatMatrix *  a,
ScePspQuatMatrix *  b,
ScePspQuatMatrix *  at,
ScePspQuatMatrix *  bt,
float  t 
)

Return a sample from a hermite spline interpolation

Parameters:
qout - pointer to output quaternion
a - pointer to start quaternion
b - pointer to end quaternion
at - pointer to tangent point for quaternion a
bt - pointer to tangent point for quaternion b
t - time value to sample, from 0 to 1

void vfpu_quaternion_hermite_tangent ( ScePspQuatMatrix *  qout,
ScePspQuatMatrix *  p1,
ScePspQuatMatrix *  p2,
float  bias 
)

Return a tangent point for hermite spline interpolation

Parameters:
qout - pointer to output quaternion
p1 - pointer to p-1 on spline curve for tangent
p2 - pointer to p+1 on spline curve for tangent
bias - value to scale difference between endpoints. for example, 0.5 results in a catmull-rom spline tangent

void vfpu_quaternion_to_matrix ( ScePspQuatMatrix *  q,
ScePspFMatrix4 *  m 
)

Convert quaternion to rotation matrix

Parameters:
q - pointer to input quaternion
m - pointer to output matrix
